entry.title: iPhone Calendar Spam
entry.summary: With the evolution of technology, scammers are hooking their pea sized brains up to the cloud to discover new possiblities of spamming people. Here am I, presenting what to do if you are one of those unlucky guy/gal out there.

entry.title: Just random things
entry.summary: Random things aren't random at all. Sometimes, it might be difficult for your beloved PC to generate a proper entropy for things that needs to be random. We will explore the solution behind this peculiar problem.

entry.title: A good way to wipe disks off
entry.summary: Hi again, today in this NOOB friendly Privacy series of my journal, I will be discussing a good, trusted way to wipe disks off. Including your precious SSD or that god awful HDD from your grandma's PC which you wanna sell on ebay for couple of bucks. This is must.

entry.title: All about GPG Encryption
entry.summary: This is the (Part 2) of All about GPG series. In this part, we will learn how to encrypt stuff with GNU Privacy Guard. After reading this guide, you will be able to encrypt/decrypt files and securely transfer your files to it.

entry.title: All about GPG Signing
entry.summary: This is the (Part 1) of All about GPG series. In this part, we will learn how to sign stuff with GNU Privacy Guard. After reading this guide, you will be able to digitally sign files and distribute your code with your assurance.

entry.title: All about GPG
entry.summary: One guide to rule GPG all! In this noob friendly guide, we will learn how to generate, use and sign stuff with GNU Privacy Guard. After reading this guide, your private life will be much more private than ever.
